casebody.data:
IN RE LOUIS G. BASSO, JR., REVOCABLE LIVING TRUST. Mary Angela Basso, Appellant,
v.
Thomas Brennan Fraser, Successor Trustee, and Ronald M. Barron, Trustee, Appellees. SC: 158629
COA: 337321 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 2, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's February 4, 2019 order is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that reconsideration of our previous order is warranted. MCR 7.311(G).
